definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: He likes to drink, have a good time, and tell everyone how wonderful he is.
sentences.chinese: 他開懷暢飲，歡度每一刻，告訴每個人他有多棒。

sentences.english: With the title Open Happiness, the song is an advertisement by association.
sentences.chinese: 這首名爲《暢爽開懷》的歌靠的就是“聯想”作廣告。

sentences.english: The food was so good that he forgot his weight-watching program and pork himself out.
sentences.chinese: 食物太好了，他忘記了要減肥，開懷大嚼。

sentences.english: I don't have a plan. Except, it's time my mom laughed again.
sentences.chinese: 我媽媽再次開懷大笑的時候，我纔有了新計劃。

sentences.english: I work before the morning, I was happy all the day.
sentences.chinese: 清晨我醒來，整天都樂開懷。

sentences.english: No hesitation at all, just her wide smile.
sentences.chinese: 她毫不遲疑，她只是開懷大笑。

sentences.english: It also helps you avoid cravings and overindulging .
sentences.chinese: 它也幫助你避免偏食和放縱開懷。

sentences.english: Unbridled drink it and enjoy, enjoy the ease of food.
sentences.chinese: 肆無忌憚的開懷暢飲，輕鬆自如的享受美食。

sentences.english: It's the people's laughter or the feeling you get from someone.
sentences.chinese: 是那種看到人們因爲你的表演開懷大笑時的成就感。

sentences.english: This's why the site is built. Hope you will smile at it and be relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 這是創辦這個站點的初衷，望能博君開懷一笑。

sentences.english: We react like children, with smiles and laughter.
sentences.chinese: 我們會像孩子那樣開懷大笑。

sentences.english: We covered every inch of our bodies with black, sticky mud and began to laugh very hard.
sentences.chinese: 我們將渾身上下都塗上黑色的粘泥，然後開懷大笑。

sentences.english: Please be ready to laugh, will be listed gift to embrace happiness.
sentences.chinese: 請隨時準備開懷大笑，將幸福的禮物攬入懷抱。

sentences.english: The question triggers another big grin from Berger.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題又一次使伯傑開懷大笑。

sentences.english: And Traveller's Tales, a British software company, will release a video game based on Lego's new Pirates play sets.
sentences.chinese: 樂高公司的管理高層聽到這樣的情緒一定會開懷一笑。

definition: to enjoy oneself to the full/to one's heart's content
eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
to be dedicated to one's work/to respect one's work
to wish to continue sth/to have not fully expressed oneself
